divs: sighting detailsi was driving west bound on i-20, just south of mesquite around noon when i saw an unknown size, grey, rectangular object to the north\ north west. my view of it was side-on. when i saw it, passengers in the car with me believed it was a blimp, but i knew that it was too big, and of the wrong shape. i know it was at a distance of 1-3 miles, as it was sort of hazy, about like the dallas skyline was at that distance. the object appeared three-dimensional, but its width i am not sure of. it didn't seem to have any lights. the sighting ended as i moved toward my destination in a neighborhood with trees and two-story houses.
Summary: Gray, rectangular craft hovering, perhaps moving slowly over Mesquite, TX
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Mesquite
There were no other sightings in Mesquite on or around December 17th 2011
